subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The experience of watching Don Larsen’s perfect game from 1956 was a rare event for fans at the Yogi Berra Museum theater Friday night because preservation was not a concern a half-century ago.
snippet: The experience of watching Don Larsen’s perfect game from 1956 was a rare event for fans at the Yogi Berra Museum theater Friday night because preservation was not a concern a half-century ago.
